alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 17 at 2:35PM PDT until April 19 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches above 4000 feet and 6 to 12 inches above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially off paved and treated roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
